room_title: Escape room "The Missing Manuscript of Edgar Allan Poe​" by Xscape The Room in Philadelphia
room_description: You and your team will embark on a mysterious journey into the residence of literary mad genius, Edgar Allan Poe- master of mystery and father of the macabre. Hidden away in this eerie estate lies his last great work. You are tasked to find it, but is it worth the risk? Suspenseful fun lies around every corner as you and your team quickly become absorbed in Poe’s world. Collect clues and solve mysteries as you try locate the missing manuscript and escape before it is too late.
